info.title: Zotify API
info.description: A RESTful API for Zotify, a Spotify music downloader.

get.description: Initiates the OAuth2 login flow for a given provider.
Handles the OAuth2 callback from the provider.

post.description:
Clears stored provider credentials from the database.
TODO: This is currently provider-specific and should be moved to the provider layer.

delete.description: Clear entire cache or by type.

post.description:
Reloads the logging framework's configuration from the
`logging_framework.yml` file at runtime.

schema.title: Response Reload Logging Config Api System Logging Reload Post

get.description: Returns uptime in seconds and human-readable format.
Returns a safe subset of environment info

schema.title: Response Get User Liked Api User Liked Get
Response Get User History Api User History Get
Response List Tracks Api Tracks Get
Response Upload Track Cover Api Tracks  Track Id  Cover Post

post.description: Returns metadata for all given tracks in one call.

get.summary: Get extended metadata for a track
get.description:
Retrieves extended metadata for a specific track.

- **track_id**: The ID of the track to retrieve metadata for.

patch.summary: Update extended metadata for a track
patch.description:
Updates extended metadata for a specific track.

- **track_id**: The ID of the track to update.
- **meta**: A `MetadataUpdate` object with the fields to update.

post.description: Queue one or more tracks for download.

get.description: Get the current status of the download queue.

post.description: Retry all failed downloads in the queue.
Manually process one job from the download queue.

Triggers a global synchronization job.
In a real app, this would be a background task.

schema.title: Response Trigger Sync Api Sync Trigger Post
Response List Webhooks Api Webhooks Get
Response Fire Webhook Api Webhooks Fire Post
Response Get Notifications Api Notifications Get

get.description: Returns OpenAPI spec or a specific schema fragment.

schema.title: Response Get Schema Api Schema Get

type.title: Type
type.description: The type of cache to clear (e.g., 'search', 'metadata'). If omitted, the entire cache is cleared.

total_items.title: Total Items
total_items.description: The total number of items in the cache.

by_type.title: By Type
by_type.description: A dictionary with the number of items for each cache type.
